titleStmt.title: A proclamation concernynge the Kynges style made the. XXIII. day of Ianuary, the XXXIII. yere of his maiesties most gracious reygne.
Proclamations. 1542-01-23
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Thomas Berthelet regius impressor excudebat. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Adds King of Ireland to Henry VIII's style.
Regarding Berthelet's delivery of copies of this and some later proclamations, see Arber II.51 ff.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
Appears at reels 10 and 152 (Society of Antiquaries copy).
